Body:
r = self.auth(Request())
self.assertIn('Authorization', r.headers)
self.assertTrue(r.headers['Authorization'].startswith('Bearer'),
    'Authorization headers does not start with Bearer')
core_client_patch.assert_called_with(server_url='https://accounts.com/auth/v1')
oauth_client_patch.assert_called_with('53210789456', None, server_url=
    'https://oauth.com/oauth/v1')
oauth_client_patch.return_value.authorize_token.assert_called_with(
    core_client_patch.return_value.login.return_value, 'profile')
mock.patch('fxa.core.Client', return_value=mocked_core_client())mock.patch('fxa.oauth.Client', return_value=mocked_oauth_client())
